pr_title: FM2-94: Initial implementation of medicationRequest resource

timeline.bodyText: Could you add some tests for a couple of Drug Order statuses? Should be as simple as setting dateActivated to new Date() or setting voided to true. Otherwise, LGTM.
timeline.author: ibacher
